```{r}
library(bayesrules)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
y <- c(7, 3, 8, 9, 10, 12)

plot_poisson_likelihood(y = y, lambda_upper_bound = 20)
```

```{r}
# Summarize y
sum_y <- sum(y)
n <- length(y)

# Parameters for the posterior Gamma distribution
shape_post <- 400 + sum_y
rate_post <- 80 + n

# Plot the prior and posterior
plot_gamma(shape = 400, rate = 80)
plot_gamma(shape = shape_post, rate = rate_post)
```

```{r}
# Summarize the prior
summarize_gamma_poisson(shape = 400, rate = 80, sum_y = sum_y, n = n)

# Summarize the posterior
summarize_gamma_poisson(shape = shape_post, rate = rate_post, sum_y = sum_y, n = n)

```
